external_references.description: ESET. (2022, February). THREAT REPORT T3 2021. Retrieved February 10, 2022.
F-Secure Labs. (2015, September 17). The Dukes: 7 years of Russian cyberespionage. Retrieved December 10, 2015.
Secureworks CTU. (n.d.). IRON HEMLOCK. Retrieved February 22, 2022.

description: [APT29](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0016) has used various forms of spearphishing attempting to get a user to open attachments, including, but not limited to, malicious Microsoft Word documents, .pdf, and .lnk files. (Citation: F-Secure The Dukes)(Citation: ESET T3 Threat Report 2021)(Citation: Secureworks IRON HEMLOCK Profile)
